name: The Jumper (LailsonGameDeveloper)
description:
Use the W,A,S,D keys to move the character, hold the shift key on the keyboard to make the character run and use the space of the keyboard to jump, pause the game using Esc key on the keyboard.

The Jumper is a simple platformer that guarantees diverse for all ages...!

Collect as many gems as possible and move to the next level...!
